query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHK , A.MANDT , CS622_PJT AS PJT , CS622_PRO AS PRO , CS622_SPC2 AS SPC2 , CS622_SPC AS SPC , CS622_PL AS PL , CS622_DAN AS DAN , CS622_HNO AS HNO , CS622_UPN AS UPN , CASE WHEN (CS113_JUC = '') OR (CS113_JUC IS NULL) THEN CS622_TYN ELSE CS113_JUC END AS TYN --형식(CS113에 값이 없으면 CS622_TYN에 저장된 기본값 조회) , CS622_SPT AS SPT , CS622_ADDR AS ADDR , CS622_NAM AS NAM , CS622_BLD AS BLD , CS622_ARA AS ARA , CS622_TEM AS TEM , CS622_BSU AS BSU , CS622_BPM AS BPM , CS622_JUJ AS JUJ , CS622_BUJ AS BUJ , CS622_WDT AS WDT , CS622_IGD AS IGD , CS622_ISD AS ISD , CS622_MGM AS MGM , CS622_MIM AS MIM , CS622_BHDA AS BHDA , CS622_BHDB AS BHDB , CS622_UIC AS UIC , CS622_UID AS UID , CS622_AMT AS AMT , CS622_GBN2 AS GBN2 , CS622_PMON AS PMON , CS622_HST AS HST , CS622_GBN AS GBN , CS622_GBN3 AS GBN3 , CS622_CLO AS CLO , CASE WHEN B.CS113_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN VALUE(CS113_YON,0) ELSE VALUE(CS622_YON,0) END YON , CS622_DAT AS DAT , VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',CS622_ARA),'') ARA_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',CS622_TEM),'') TEM_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,CS622_BSU),'') BSU_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,CS622_BPM),'') BPM_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,CS622_JUJ),'') JUJ_NM , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT,CS622_BUJ),'') BUJ_NM , CS622_HB AS HB , CS622_HFROM AS HFROM , CS622_HTO AS HTO , CS113_YDT AS YDT , CS113_USD AS USD , CS113_UMR AS UMR , CS113_FDT AS FDT , CS113_YBN AS FYN , CASE WHEN B.CS113_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN VALUE(CS113_YMT,0) ELSE VALUE(CS622_AMT,0) END AS YMT , VALUE(CASE WHEN CS622_PRO = '3' AND VALUE(CS113_HEP,'') = '' THEN CS622_HEP ELSE CS113_HEP END,'01') AS HEP , CASE WHEN CS622_PRO = '3' AND CS622_UID = VALUE(B.CS113_UHJ,'') THEN VALUE(B.CS113_GBN,'') WHEN CS622_PRO = '3' AND CS622_UID != VALUE(B.CS113_UHJ,'') THEN '' ELSE VALUE(B.CS113_GBN,'') END RSN , CASE WHEN CS622_PRO = '3' AND A.CS622_UID = VALUE(B.CS113_UHJ,'') THEN VALUE(B.CS113_RMK,'') WHEN CS622_PRO = '3' AND A.CS622_UID != VALUE(B.CS113_UHJ,'') THEN '' ELSE VALUE(B.CS113_RMK,'') END RMK , CASE WHEN B.CS113_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END SAV , CASE WHEN B.CS113_UDT = '' OR B.CS113_UDT = '00000000' OR B.CS113_UDT IS NULL THEN B.CS113_MDT ELSE B.CS113_UDT END SAV_D , CS113_PDN AS PDN , CS653_TOT AS TOT , CS653_SIP AS SIP FROM SAPHEE.ZCST622 A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MANDT, CS113_PJT, CS113_HNO, CS113_SEQ, CS113_GBN, --사유 CS113_RMK, --비고 CS113_USE, CS113_UHJ, --유상일반만료일 CS113_BDT, CS113_YDT, --계약예정일 CS113_FDT, --실패예정일 CS113_STS, --호기상태 CS113_SGB, CS113_FFG, CS113_YBN, --FM여부 CS113_FHG, CS113_HYN, --HRTS여부 CS113_YMT, --계약단가 CS113_HMT, --HRTS료 CS113_DYN, --DIPBX여부 CS113_DMT, --DIPBX료 CS113_YON, --계약개월수 CS113_YDA, --수주예상금액 CS113_MDT, CS113_MTM, CS113_MUR, CS113_UDT, CS113_UTM, CS113_UUR, CS113_USD, CS113_UMR, CS113_HEP, CS113_PDN, --팔레트당 기준금액 CS113_JUC, --형식구분 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CS113_PJT, CS113_HNO ORDER BY CS113_SEQ DESC) RNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST113 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS113_PJT LIKE '_%' AND CS113_HNO LIKE '_%' AND CS113_SEQ LIKE '_%' AND CS113_USE = 'Y' ) AS B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.RNO = 1 AND B.CS113_PJT = A.CS622_PJT AND B.CS113_HNO = A.CS622_HNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST653 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS622_DAT = C.CS653_DAT AND A.CS622_PJT = C.CS653_PJT WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS622_DAT = #DAT# AND VALUE(CS622_CLO, 'N') = 'N' AND CASE WHEN B.CS113_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END = 'Y' --저장된것만 원가값이 나옴.
AND CS622_PJT = #PJT#
AND CS622_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS622_BSU = #BSU#
AND CS622_BPM = #BPM#
AND CS622_TEM = #TEM#
AND CS622_TEM IN (SELECT CODE2 AS CODE FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND DTEXT1 = #DPT#)
AND CS622_PRO = #PRO#
WITH UR
